subject: SIMSONN PLUS PRO LINKS OFF (404 NOT FOUND)
description_text:
I purchased the SIMSONN PRO PLUS P2 pedal, and I'm unable to download the manuals and drivers from the website under the Technical Details tab. All the links are returning a 404 Not Found error.

I kindly request that the links be fixed so I can download the necessary files. Thank you in advance.
